long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension for the Power Automate Classic Designer.

Expand and collapse cards: You can expand and collapse all cards in the user interface. This provides a better overview and makes it easier to navigate through complex processes.

Copying expressions to the clipboard: You can simply copy expressions to the clipboard. This makes it easier to share and reuse code segments.

Enlargeable text fields: Text fields can now be enlarged to make it easier to read and edit longer texts or complex expressions.

Adjustments to the appearance of the cards: The appearance of the cards has been adjusted, including rounded corners, changed background and gridded alignment of the elements, which provides more space for the text fields.

PowerFx editor: The PowerFx editor has been fixed to the right edge and enlarged, improving visibility and accessibility.
